scripts.build:app-adesso-demo:prod: npm run use-adesso-demo-styles && ng build app-adesso-demo --base-href .
scripts.build:element-ing-description-box:prod: npm run style:use-ing && ng build element-ing-description-box --configuration production --output-hashing none && node apps/element-ing-description-box/concatenate.js
scripts.build:element-ing-instrument-search:prod: ng build element-ing-instrument-search --configuration production --output-hashing none && node apps/element-ing-instrument-search/concatenate.js
scripts.build:element-instrument-detail:prod: npm run style:use-adesso && ng build element-instrument-detail --configuration production --output-hashing none && node apps/element-instrument-detail/concatenate.js
scripts.build:web-adesso-demo:prod: npm run style:use-adesso && ng build web-adesso-demo --configuration production --output-hashing none && nx run web-adesso-demo:server:production
scripts.build:web-adesso-epi-demo:prod: npm run style:use-adesso ng build web-adesso-epi-demo --configuration production && ng serve web-adesso-epi-demo:server:production
scripts.build:web-afp-demo:prod: npm run use-afp-demo-styles && ng build web-afp-demo --configuration production && ng serve web-afp-demo:server:production
scripts.build:web-ing:prod: npm run style:use-ing && ng build web-ing --configuration production && ng serve web-ing:server:production
scripts.build:web-recupera-direct:prod: npm run style:use-recupera-direct &&  ng build web-recupera-direct --configuration production && ng serve web-recupera-direct:server:production
scripts.build:web-storybook:prod: npm run use-storybook-styles && ng build web-storybook --prod && ng serve web-storybook:server:production
scripts.build:web-training:prod: npm run style:use-training && ng build web-training --configuration production && ng serve web-training:server:production
scripts.build:web-vr-payment:prod: npm run style:use-volksbank && ng build web-vr-payment --configuration production && ng serve web-vr-payment:server:production
scripts.bundlebuild:all-apps: npm run build:web-adesso-demo:prod && npm run build:web-adesso-epi-demo:prod && npm run build:element-instrument-detail:prod && npm run build:storybook && npm run build:web-vr-payment:prod && npm run build:web-ing:prod && npm run build:element-ing-description-box:prod && npm run build:web-recupera-direct:prod && npm run build:web-training:prod && npm run build:element-ing-instrument-search:prod
scripts.bundledeploy:everything: npm run deploy:web-adesso-demo:azure && npm run deploy:storybook:azure && deploy:web-vr-payment:azure && deploy:web-ing:azure
scripts.deploy:api:adessodemoapi: cd ../Api/AdessoDemoApi/AdessoDemoApi && dotnet publish -c Release -p:UseAppHost=false && cd ../../../Deployment/terraform/dotnet-api && terraform init && terraform workspace select adessodemoapi && terraform plan -var=terraform_name=adessodemoapi -var=dist_folder=/AdessoDemoApi/bin/Release/net5.0/publish -var=dll_name=AdessoDemoApi && terraform apply -auto-approve -var=terraform_name=adessodemoapi -var=dist_folder=AdessoDemoApi/AdessoDemoApi/bin/Release/net5.0/publish -var=dll_name=AdessoDemoApi
scripts.deploy:api:adessodemoapi:destroy: cd ../Deployment/terraform/dotnet-api && terraform init && terraform workspace select adessodemoapi && terraform destroy -auto-approve -var=terraform_name=adessodemoapi -var=dist_folder=AdessoDemoApi/AdessoDemoApi/bin/Release/net5.0/publish -var=dll_name=HelloWorld
scripts.deploy:app-adesso-demo:azure: npm run build:app-adesso-demo:prod && cd ../Deployment/terraform/angular-web && terraform init && terraform workspace select <%= terraformName %> && terraform plan -var=terraform_name=<%= terraformName %> -var=dist_folder=app-adesso-demo -var=with_ssr=0 && terraform apply -auto-approve -var=terraform_name=<%= terraformName %> -var=dist_folder=app-adesso-demo -var=with_ssr=0
scripts.deploy:app-adesso-demo:azure:destroy: cd ../Deployment/terraform/angular-web && terraform init && terraform workspace select <%= terraformName %> && terraform destroy -auto-approve -var=terraform_name=<%= terraformName %> -var=dist_folder=app-adesso-demo
scripts.deploy:storybook:azure: npm run build:storybook && cd .storybook/terraform && terraform init && terraform plan && terraform apply -auto-approve
scripts.deploy:web-adesso-demo:azure: npm run build:web-adesso-demo:prod && cd ../Deployment/terraform/angular-web && terraform init && terraform workspace select adessodemo && terraform plan -var=terraform_name=adessodemo -var=dist_folder=web-adesso-demo -var=with_ssr=1 && terraform apply -auto-approve -var=terraform_name=adessodemo -var=dist_folder=web-adesso-demo -var=with_ssr=1
scripts.deploy:web-adesso-demo:azure:destroy: cd ../Deployment/terraform/angular-web && terraform init && terraform workspace select adessodemo && terraform destroy -auto-approve -var=terraform_name=adessodemo -var=dist_folder=web-adesso-demo

scripts.schematics:build: cd .schematics && npm install && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.schematics:create:app: npm run schematics:build && nx generate app
scripts.schematics:create:element: npm run schematics:build && nx generate element
scripts.schematics:create:feature: npm run schematics:build && nx generate feature
scripts.schematics:create:page: npm run schematics:build && nx generate page
scripts.schematics:create:repository: npm run schematics:build && nx generate repository
scripts.schematics:create:service: npm run schematics:build && nx generate service
scripts.schematics:create:ui: npm run schematics:build && nx generate ui
scripts.schematics:create:util: npm run schematics:build && nx generate util
scripts.schematics:create:web: npm run schematics:build && nx generate web
scripts.serve:app-adesso-demo:android: npm run build:app-adesso-demo:prod && cd ../Cordova && npm run build-android && npm run emulate-android
scripts.serve:app-adesso-demo:browser: npm run build:app-adesso-demo:prod && cd ../Cordova && npm run build-browser && npm run emulate-browser
scripts.serve:app-adesso-demo:ios: npm run build:app-adesso-demo:prod && cd ../Cordova && npm run build-ios && npm run emulate-ios
scripts.serve:storybook:adesso: npm run style:use-adesso && npm run serve:storybook
scripts.serve:storybook:ing: npm run style:use-ing && npm run serve:storybook
scripts.serve:storybook:recupera-direct: npm run style:use-recupera-direct && npm run serve:storybook
scripts.serve:storybook:training: npm run style:use-training && npm run serve:storybook
scripts.serve:storybook:volksbank: npm run style:use-volksbank && npm run serve:storybook
scripts.serve:web-adesso-demo:client: npm run style:use-adesso && ng serve web-adesso-demo --configuration=dev
scripts.serve:web-adesso-demo:ssr: npm run style:use-adesso && nx run web-adesso-demo:serve-ssr --configuration=dev
scripts.serve:web-adesso-epi-demo:server-ssr: npm run style:use-adesso && ng serve web-adesso-epi-demo:serve-ssr --configuration=dev
scripts.serve:web-afp-demo:client: npm run use-afp-demo-styles && ng serve web-afp-demo --configuration=dev
scripts.serve:web-afp-demo:ssr: npm run use-afp-demo-styles && ng serve web-afp-demo:serve-ssr --configuration=dev
scripts.serve:web-ing:client: npm run style:use-ing && ng serve web-ing --configuration=dev
scripts.serve:web-ing:ssr: npm run style:use-ing && ng serve web-ing:serve-ssr --configuration=dev
scripts.serve:web-recupera-direct:ssr: npm run style:use-recupera-direct && ng serve web-recupera-direct --configuration=dev
scripts.serve:web-storybook:client: npm run use-storybook-styles && ng serve web-storybook --configuration=dev
scripts.serve:web-storybook:ssr: npm run use-storybook-styles && ng serve web-storybook:serve-ssr --configuration=dev
scripts.serve:web-training:client: npm run style:use-training && ng serve web-training --configuration=dev --port 4210
scripts.serve:web-training:ssr: npm run style:use-training && ng serve web-training:serve-ssr --configuration=dev --port 4210
scripts.serve:web-vr-payment:client: npm run style:use-volksbank && ng serve web-vr-payment --configuration=dev
scripts.serve:web-vr-payment:ssr: npm run style:use-volksbank && ng serve web-vr-payment:serve-ssr --configuration=dev
scripts.stats:app-adesso-demo:prod: npm run build:app-adesso-demo:prod && ng build --stats-json && webpack-bundle-analyzer dist/apps/app-adesso-demo/stats.json
scripts.stats:web-afp-demo:prod: npm run build:web-afp-demo:prod && ng build --stats-json && webpack-bundle-analyzer dist/apps/web-afp-demo/stats.json
scripts.stats:web-storybook:prod: npm run build:web-storybook:prod && ng build --stats-json && webpack-bundle-analyzer dist/.storybook/web-storybook/stats.json
scripts.xxx:postinstall: ngcc --properties es2017 browser module main --first-only --create-ivy-entry-points && node ./decorate-angular-cli.js
scripts.xxx:prepare-system: npm run xxx:install-yarn && npm run xxx:install-nx
